---
title: "Chocolate Chips Cookie <br> 巧克力曲奇"
categories: [Dessert]
image: ./Images/choco-cookie.jpg
---

### 🥣 Ingredients | 用料

| Ingredient | 用料 | Amount | 份量 |
|------------|------|--------|------|
| Salted butter (softened) | 黄油（软化） | 227 g | 227克 |
| Granulated sugar | 白砂糖 | 232 g | 232克 |
| Light brown sugar (packed) | 红糖（压实） | 213 g | 213克 |
| Pure vanilla extract | 香草精 | 8 g | 8克 |
| Eggs (large) | 鸡蛋（大） | 2 | 2个 |
| All-purpose flour | 中筋面粉 | 410 g | 410克 |
| Baking soda | 小苏打 | 4 g | 4克 |
| Sea salt | 海盐 | 5 g | 5克 |
| Chocolate chips | 巧克力豆 | 396 g | 396克 |

### 🍴 Steps | 步骤
1. Preheat oven to 190°C (375°F). 
 预热烤箱至190°C（375°F）。
2. In a medium bowl, mix flour, baking soda, and salt. Set aside.  
 将面粉、小苏打和盐混合均匀，备用。
3. Cream together the butter and sugars until smooth and fluffy.  
 将黄油与两种糖打发至顺滑松软。
4. Beat in eggs and vanilla until light, about 1 minute.  
 黄油碗中加入鸡蛋和香草精，打发约1分钟至颜色变浅。
5. Gradually mix in dry ingredients until combined.  
 分次加入粉类，搅拌均匀。
6. Fold in chocolate chips and mix well.  
 加入巧克力豆，拌匀。
7. Roll 2–3 spoons of dough into balls and space evenly on baking sheets.  
 取2–3勺面团搓圆，均匀排放在烤盘上。
8. Bake for 8–10 minutes until just starting to turn golden.  
 烘烤8–10分钟，边缘微微上色即可取出。
9. Let cool on baking pan for 5 minutes, then transfer to a wire rack.  
 在烤盘中冷却5分钟后移至晾架冷却。
